results.title: Acute coronary syndrome due to coronary vasospasm: a case report.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@Acute coronary syndrome@@@ due to @DISEASE_Coronary_Vasospasm @DISEASE_MESH:D003329 @@@coronary vasospasm@@@: a case report.

citations.NLM: Wang A, Meir J, Malik A, Fishkin T, Dey S, Panza JA, Haidry S. Acute coronary syndrome due to coronary vasospasm: a case report. Future Cardiol. 2024 Sep 4;():1-6. PMID: 39229652

results.title: The role of computed tomography coronary angiography in multi-vessel coronary vasospasm: a case report
results.text_hl: Cold pressor testing was unsuccessful in reproducing @DISEASE_Vasospasm_Intracranial @DISEASE_MESH:D020301 @@@vasospasm@@@. @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@Acute coronary syndrome@@@ treatment was discontinued, he received smoking cessation advice and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ 5 mg daily was started.

citations.NLM: Tomlinson JS, Patel A, Levy T. The role of computed tomography coronary angiography in multi-vessel coronary vasospasm: a case report Eur Heart J Case Rep. 2021 Feb;5(2):ytab015. PMID: 33738416
citations.BibTeX: @article{33738416, title={The role of computed tomography coronary angiography in multi-vessel coronary vasospasm: a case report}, author={Tomlinson JS and Patel A and Levy T}, journal={Eur Heart J Case Rep}, volume={5}, number={2}, pages={ytab015}}

results.title: Comparison of fimasartan and amlodipine therapy on carotid atherosclerotic plaque inflammation
results.text_hl: Fifty @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@acute coronary syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@ACS@@@) and at least one lesion with @CHEMICAL_Fluorodeoxyglucose_F18 @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019788 @@@18FDG@@@ uptake in the carotid artery (target-to-background ratio [TBR] >= 1.6) were randomly assigned to receive either @CHEMICAL_fimasartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C558933 @@@fimasartan@@@ (60 mg once a day) or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (5 mg once a day).

citations.NLM: Oh M, Lee CW, Ahn JM, Park DW, Kang SJ, Lee SW, Kim YH, Moon DH, Park SW, Park SJ. Comparison of fimasartan and amlodipine therapy on carotid atherosclerotic plaque inflammation Clin Cardiol. 2019 Feb;42(2):241-246. PMID: 30537083
citations.BibTeX: @article{30537083, title={Comparison of fimasartan and amlodipine therapy on carotid atherosclerotic plaque inflammation}, author={Oh M and Lee CW and Ahn JM and Park DW and Kang SJ and Lee SW and Kim YH and Moon DH and Park SW and Park SJ}, journal={Clin Cardiol}, volume={42}, number={2}, pages={241-246}}

results.title: [Reperfusion syndrome after direct myocardial revascularization on beating heart in patients with ischemic heart disease. Possibilities of prevention with amlodipine].
results.text_hl: Possibilities of secondary prevention of @DISEASE_Reperfusion_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D015427 @@@reperfusion syndrome@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ was assessed in 46 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (39 with class III-IV @DISEASE_Angina_Pectoris @DISEASE_MESH:D000787 @@@angina@@@ after @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@ and 7 with non @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@ST elevation acute coronary syndrome@@@).

results.title: Adverse effects of propafenone after long-term therapy with the addition of citalopram.
results.text_hl: She was started on @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 2.5 mg orally once daily, a @CHEMICAL_Nitroglycerin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005996 @@@nitroglycerin@@@ patch (0.4 mg/h), and @CHEMICAL_Warfarin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014859 @@@warfarin@@@ 5 mg orally once daily.

citations.NLM: Garcia A. Adverse effects of propafenone after long-term therapy with the addition of citalopram. Am J Geriatr Pharmacother. 2008 Jun;6(2):96-9. PMID: 18675768

results.title: [32-year-old patient with acute myocardial infarction possibly induced by the appetite suppressant sibutramine].
results.text_hl: Assuming that the @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@acute coronary syndrome@@@ had been induced by @DISEASE_Coronary_Vasospasm @DISEASE_MESH:D003329 @@@coronary spasms@@@, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@.

citations.NLM: Pöss J, Böhm M, Link A. [32-year-old patient with acute myocardial infarction possibly induced by the appetite suppressant sibutramine]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 2010 May;135(19):965-8. PMID: 20446231
